def is_prime(number):
	if number == 1: return False
	if number == 2 or number == 3: return True
	if number % 2 == 0: return False
	for i in range(3, number/2+2,2):
		if number % i == 0:
			return False 
	return True
def is_pallindrome(number):
	if len(number) < 2:
		return True
	else:
		return number[0] == number[-1] and is_pallindrome(number[1:-1])

number = int(raw_input())
while number > 0:
	if is_pallindrome(str(number)):
		if is_prime(number):
			print number
			break
	number += 1
